mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ENUM_I18N ( F_OWNER_ENUM_ID, F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ ownerEnumId }, #{ targetLocaleId }, #{ title }, #{ description }, CAST((julianday('now') - 2440587.5) * 86400000 AS INTEGER) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_ENUM_I18N SET F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = CAST((julianday('now') - 2440587.5) * 86400000 AS INTEGER) WHERE F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId } AND F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID = #{ targetLocaleId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID AS "ownerEnumId", T1.F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID AS "targetLocaleId", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T2.F_ENUM_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "_title", T2.F_ENUM_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title", T3.F_TITLE AS "target_title" FROM T_ENUM_I18N T1 LEFT JOIN T_ENUM T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = T2.F_ENUM_ID LEFT JOIN T_LOCALE T3 ON T1.F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID = T3.F_LOCALE_ID WHERE T1.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId } AND T1.F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID = #{ targetLocaleId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_ENUM_I18N T1

SELECT T1.F_ENUM_ID AS "enumId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_ENUM_NAME AS "enumName", T1.F_ENCODE_STRING AS "encodeString", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_ENUM_NAME || '(' || T1.F_TITLE || ')' AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_ENUM T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_ENUM_ID = #{ ownerEnumId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_ENUM_ID) AS "maxEnumId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_ENUM T1
T1.F_ENUM_NAME || '(' || T1.F_TITLE || ')' LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_LOCALE_ID AS "localeId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_TITLE AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_LOCALE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_LOCALE_ID = #{ targetLocaleId }
